channel.title: NOOBscapev3 Client not connecting to server on Linux box
channel.description:
Hello!
I'm not super knowledgable in any of this but I'm having fun with it and ran into a roadblock that I'm hoping for help with!
I have a linux server running ubuntu 14.04 x64 that I got working with the noobscape server and client while running on the server. (server is not in my house its hosted).
When I run a client on my server using VNC using "localhost" it works fine.. When I use the IP or NO-IP I created it does not connect whether I'm running client off my server or off my home computer.
I feel like I have tried everything though I'm sure I haven't :)..
I would really appreciate if anyone knows a fix for this issue no matter how silly it probably ends up being!
Thank you in advance.
Matt
Edit: Fixed. I discovered the game was listening for the port only on "localhost". I had to edit server.java I think it was with my IP.
